messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Did anyone here about this?
messages.msgSnippet: The school system where I live has already started doing this.   They now teach to the tests that have been implemented and they don t teach much of value
messages.messageBody:
The school system where I live has already started
doing this. They now teach to the tests that have
been implemented and they don't teach much of value
anymore. They were trying to get k and 1 to write
essays because the tests are made up of essay
questions, so my son who couldn't read was required
to write essays every friday and was graded on them
by some miracle he passed first grade anyway and now
we homeschool
